select sab.*,sa.name as article_name,ur.name as borrow_name,ur.tel as borrow_tel from sys_article_borrow as sab,sys_article_detail as sad,sys_article as sa,user_resident as ur
sab.article_detail_id = sad.id and sad.article_id = sa.id and sab.create_id = ur.id
and sab.borrow_status = #{borrowStatus}
order by sab.create_date DESC
